content.rendered:
Global Expansion Service For Amazon

The Global Expansion program enables the sellers not to limit themselves by selling only in Indian marketplace but also to expand their business in to global markets. This is only 4 step process.

  1. Decide what and where to sell
  2. Registration
  3. Listing
  4. Delivery of products
  5. Get paid and expand your business.

Global Expansion For Amazon

This enables sellers to reach millions of their shoppers leading to ultimately boost in revenue and growth in their business. There are some benefits and ease that Amazon provide you while you opt for this expansion.

  • With Amazon, your export journey becomes a lot easier as you get
  • Access to 15 international Amazon marketplaces like www.amazon.com (US), www.amazon.co.uk (UK), www.amazon.ae (AE), etc.
  • Access to Hundreds of millions of customers to whom you can showcase and sell your products.
  • Utilize services like Fulfilled by Amazon (FBA) to store your products in Amazon Fulfillmentcenters& deliver to customers in just 2 days.
  • Refine your products and grow your Export business through customer suggestions and feedback
  • Get paid in INR as Amazon facilitates the payment in your bank account with all the currency conversions done.
Get Now
